name: Mathews Wallace LLP
tag_list: florida-business-attorney, florida-fraud-attorney, florida-litigation-attorney, florida-fraud-lawyer, florida-business-lawyer, florida-trial-lawyer, miami-business-attorney, miami-business-lawyer, florida-appellate-attorney, florida-securities-attorney, f
overview:
Mathews Wallace LLP provides superior personal and cost-effective legal services. Our practice focuses on complex commercial and tort litigation in both federal and state courts, securities arbitrations, probate litigation, and appeals.

Our clients include individuals who suffered significant losses because of unauthorized securities transactions, unsuitable investments, or churning; victims of fraud; witnesses involved in government investigations; and defendants in actions brought by the SEC, the FTC, the CFTC, or FINRA. We also regularly represent clients in Broker-Dealer securities arbitrations, commercial litigation, invasion of privacy claims, and personal injury actions. We work with our clients proactively by providing legal advice and counsel regarding their business or financial plans.
